name: Keep Them Away (TylerCKB)
description:
WARNING! This game contains jumpscares, and can be very difficult at times!

----------------------------------------------

A kid named Henry woke up at 12:00 because he heard a noise. He soon realizes that he is being hunted by monsters! He must defend himself from these increasingly angry monsters until 6:00. Will he survive?

----------------------------------------------

Made for BenBonk Game Jam #4! My 4 colors are Blue, Red, Yellow, and Black (+different shades of black!).

----------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Press Space to Start the Game.

Click under the bed to check there, then click the bedsheets to go back.

Click on the window to shut and open the blinds.

Click on the sheets to hide under them.

Survive until 6:00.

----------------------------------------------

Scratch Page: Keep THEM Away on Scratch (mit.edu)
